website_summaries.verdict: These cute crabs add an instant beach vibe to any setting and will hold most cups and cans.
pros: Made of high quality PVC for added durability
Unique design stands out from the crowd
Wide base keeps cups and cans stable and can handle a few splashes
Comes with a 30-day money back guarantee
cons: Top heavy drinks may flip over
Claws don't inflate all the way

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Fun
customer_reviews.text: These inflatable drink holders are sweet! I bought 3 of them to take to a hotel where we were hanging out with our friends. The crab inflatables look great and everybody asked me where I got them and I said from Pool Tycoon on Amazon. Super high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lee Ashby

customer_reviews.title: ) They inflated easily and looked super cute all evening
customer_reviews.text: Filled the lower level of our fountain with these for our July "Crabernet" cocktail party (LOVE Will Bullas.) They inflated easily and looked super cute all evening. I'm not sure anyone put their drinks in them, as we were using wine glasses. Happily, many guests left with crab(s). And ducks. My husband insisted that we be both crab and duck free by night's end. Would buy more next time but I am on spousal crab and duck probation until further notice.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but fade quickly
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and are a hit in our pool, but wow, the color fades fast! The bottom of the holders still look nice and pink, but on top where the sun has been hitting them they're faded and looking old despite only being used for one season. I suppose that's something I should have expected, but I didn't think of it at the time of purchase. Not bad for the price, but don't expect them to look amazing after a few months of sun.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute novelty gift.
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute. I don’t know if they will work for my purpose which is to keep our drinks out of the pool because the cup holder part is pretty shallow. They will probably work ok with canned drinks. The resorts serve in plastic glasses which may or may not work. I thought these crabs were red but they are very pink. Not sure how that’s going to go over with the guys in our group.
customer_reviews.author: Cold and Wet in the NW

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be a set of three, but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be a set of three, but I only got one for this price - was going to do a return but forgot about it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Anglemyer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: They hold drinks like they are supposed to but the claws don’t inflate all the way and they look sun faded instead of bright red like I thought they would be. Overall though they do what they are supposed to I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Mandalynnvb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floating cup holders
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery! These inflatable crab floats are durable, and much larger than some of the other floats that I have bought. Perfect floating cup holders!
customer_reviews.author: AMZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soda holder
customer_reviews.text: Great for holding cans of soda and cute. Easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was super fast, too
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift and the recipient LOVES them..can't wait to see them myself. Delivery was super fast, too.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Cute product. Doesn’t really hold full drink tips over. But my granddaughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Cute product. Doesn’t really hold full drink tips over. But my granddaughter loves them
customer_reviews.author: lisa clodfelter

customer_reviews.title: Well, that didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I did the research and thought this would be the best option because others were top heavy and this one supposedly wasn't. I put my Yeti in and it flipped right over. Then I tried a beer can, tipped over. I think the only thing that would work would be a very small cup, but I haven't tried that yet. What I'm going to try next is to cut out the bottom and push my Yeti all the way in. I think that would work. I will update when I try it. I'd return them, but the return shipping doesn't make it worth while. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Jo Maccallum

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait..
customer_reviews.text: Summer can't get here soon enough to utilize these for the pool opening !! What a great idea !
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: so cute! can't wait to use them in the ...
customer_reviews.text: so cute! can't wait to use them in the hot tub!
customer_reviews.author: J Stauffer
